name: Scary Bunny Haunted House Game
description:
Get out alive from a scary asylum full of creepy bunnies try to get you in this haunted house game, Can you escape from a haunted house alive? Download to find out. Find torch light and batteries so you can see in scary hospital full of creepy creatures. Pick up guns and ammo shoot creepy bunnies to get out alive.

Features of Scary Bunny Haunted House Game:
Haunted asylum designed environment
Detailed creepy bunnies models
Multiple guns to choose from
Challenging levels filled with excitement
Scary sound effects to enhance horror game experience
